item.description:
I’m an Artificial Intelligence student, currently working on my master degree thesis. I’m a curious person and try to learn new things every time I can. Passionate about computer science in general, and in AI and Cybersecurity in particular.

In my free time I enjoy taking pictures, reading, watching movies, or playing guitar.

I value privacy a lot, that’s why you won’t probably ever see a picture of me in this space, but feel free to contact me for questions or suggestions.

View more informations
